Class AlbumsDB

java.lang.Object
DBHelper
AlbumsDB
public class AlbumsDB extends DBHelper
The AlbumsDB class extends the DBHelper class and implements additional methods used to specifically interact with the Albums DMS database.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public void insert(Album album)
      The insert() method takes an album object and inserts it into the DB.
      Parameters:
      album - The album object to add to the DB.

    • delete

      public void delete(String whatField, String whatValue)
      The delete() method deletes albums from the DB where the search criteria provided is met. Example: delete("Id", "1") This example will delete all albums from the DB where the Id is equal to 1.
      Parameters:
      whatField - The name of the field to filter by
      whatValue - The value that the field selected must be equal to. Any albums/rows that match this criteria will be deleted

    • update

      public void update(String whatField, String whatValue, String whereField, String whereValue)
      Updates a property on one or more rows in the DB Example: update("Name", "New Name", "Id", "123") This example will update albums where the ID is 123 so that the name field is now "New Name".
      Parameters:
      whatField - The field that will be updated.
      whatValue - The value that will replace the existing value.
      whereField - The field to filter by.
      whereValue - The value to filter by.

    • select

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Object>> select(String fields, String whatField, String whatValue, String sortField, String sort)
      Selects a record or records from the database based on the criteria provided. This method creates a SQL query from the fields provided.
      Parameters:
      fields - The fields that will be returned by the SELECT command. This is a comma-separated String value.
      whatField - The field to search for
      whatValue - The value to search for within "whatField"
      sortField - The field to sort the output by
      sort - The type of sort
      Returns:
      A 2D ArrayList of the output from the SELECT query.

    • getExecuteResult

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Object>> getExecuteResult(String query)
      Selects a record or records from the database based on the criteria provided.
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to execute.
      Returns:
      A 2D ArrayList of the output from the SELECT query.

    • execute

      public void execute(String query)
      This method is used to execute a SQL statement without returning an output.
      Overrides:
      execute in class DBHelper
      Parameters:
      query - The String form of the SQL statement that you are attempting to execute.

    • selectToTable

      public DefaultTableModel selectToTable(String fields, String whatField, String whatValue, String sortField, String sort)
      Performs a SQL query and outputs a DefaultTableModel representing the data returned from the query.
      Parameters:
      fields - The fields that will be returned by the SELECT command
      whatField - The field to search for
      whatValue - The value to search for within "whatField"
      sortField - The field to sort the output by
      sort - The type of sort
      Returns:
      A DefaultTableModel representing the data returned by the SQL query.
